sections.title: Contest Strategies Overview
sections.content: Competitive programming contests require not just problem-solving skills, but also strategy and time management.

sections.title: Key Strategies
sections.content:
• Read all problems first
  • Solve easy problems quickly
  • Don't get stuck too long
  • Manage your time
  • Debug efficiently
  • Practice under timed conditions

sections.title: After the Contest
sections.content:
• Upsolve missed problems
  • Analyze mistakes
  • Review editorials
  • Track your progress
